paper_title.en: Observation and simulation of point image propagated in graded-index optical fiber

description.en: This study investigates a new transmission method of light from a point source in a multimode graded-index fiber. The position of the point source is arranged along with a mode pattern to precisely determine the location of an output point image. Propagation performance is observed in an experiment and estimated by simulation.

paper_title.en: Analysis and simulation of fiber optic temperature sensor using mode-division multiplex

description.en: Phase performance in a fiber optic temperature sensor using a mode-division multiplex is studied. The phase shift due to the temperature change of a multimode graded-index optical fiber is analyzed. The intensity fluctuation by the interference of two modes is estimated in computer simulation.

paper_title.en: Observation of mode in graded-index optical fibers with bending and cross talk in MDM

description.en: Cross talk in mode-division multiplexing system is studied. The mode patterns when the fiber is bent are observed in the experiment.

paper_title.ja: Splice Losses of LP Modes in Multimode Graded-Index Optical Fiber
paper_title.en: Splice Losses of LP Modes in Multimode Graded-Index Optical Fiber
Illuminance Distribution Analysis for Enclosed-Space Applied Light Source with Different Radiative Characteristics Using Finite Element Procedure

description.en: This paper describes an application of finite element pocedure for illuminance distribution analysis. The purpose of this paper is to study a radiative characteristic of light sources and the treatment of obstructions. For a fluorescent lamp and a semiconductor laser as light source, a computer simulation is carried out and compared with the result of measurement for two types of light source. A sphere and a circular aperture are introduced as obstructions in experiment. In the case of the fluorescent lamp, the sphere is set up to cast a complete shadow and a half shadow on a measured surface. The illuminance distribution by simulation agrees with the result of measurement. In the case of the semiconductor laser, simulation and experiment installed the circular aperture under light source are carried out similarly. The result is the same to the case of the fluorescent lamp. © 1991, The Illuminating Engineering Institute of Japan. All rights reserved.
